title: card.location.track Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Store location data in a Notefile at the periodic interval, or using a specified heartbeat.

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

start.description: Set to true to start Notefile tracking

heartbeat.description: When start is true, set to true to enable tracking even when motion is not detected

hours.description: If heartbeat is true, add a heartbeat entry at this hourly interval. Use a negative integer to specify a heartbeat in minutes instead of hours

sync.description: Set to true to perform an immediate sync to the Notehub each time a new Note is added

stop.description: Set to true to stop Notefile tracking

file.description: The name of the Notefile to store location data in
